Title: Relates to reports of substantial risk or threat of harm by mental health professionals
Summary: Exempts police and peace officers receiving treatment from mandatory reporting of substantial risk or threat of harm by mental health professionals, unless the mental health professional determines, based on reasonable professional judgment, that the condition impairs such person's ability to perform their job duties.
LawCode: Amd ยง9.46, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to reports of substantial risk or threat of harm by mental health professionals
